meanings.definition: A drug used to prevent blood clots.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed warfarins to help stop the clotting of blood.
meanings.sent2: Many patients take warfarins daily to prevent dangerous blood clots.
meanings.sent3: The blood clot tried to form, but warfarins swooped in like a superhero to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her veins flowed freely like a river, thanks to the protective shield of warfarins.
meanings.sent5: Warfarins are like tiny guardians inside your body, keeping the blood flowing smoothly.
